entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Kawartha Lakes (Lindsay)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:20 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -1.2°C

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning this evening. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the morning then clearing. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023
